meanings.sent1: The treasure hidden in the cave was undreamt by the explorers.
meanings.sent2: The undreamt surprise left everyone speechless.
meanings.sent3: Finding a unicorn in the backyard was undreamt but delightful.
meanings.sent4: The undreamt opportunity to travel the world finally arrived.
meanings.sent5: Her undreamt talent for painting amazed everyone.

meanings.definition: Not dreamed of or considered possible
meanings.sent1: The undreamt success of the small business was inspiring.
meanings.sent2: The undreamt journey to space became a reality for the astronaut.
meanings.sent3: Winning the lottery seemed undreamt until it actually happened.
meanings.sent4: The undreamt love story between the two strangers touched many hearts.
meanings.sent5: His undreamt invention revolutionized the industry.
